references.paper_title: Prevalence of neural collapse during the terminal phase of deep learning training
references.reason: This paper introduced the phenomenon of neural collapse, which is the central topic of the current paper.
This paper provides a theoretical foundation for understanding neural collapse in the unconstrained features model (UFM), which is crucial for the analysis in this paper.

references.paper_title: Deep neural collapse is provably optimal for the deep unconstrained features model
references.reason: This paper is a previous work by some of the current authors which investigated the optimality of deep neural collapse (DNC) in a simplified setting, providing a basis for the current work.

references.paper_title: Neural collapse under MSE loss: Proximity to and dynamics on the central path
references.reason: This paper investigated the dynamics of neural collapse under mean squared error (MSE) loss, which helps to understand the behavior of neural networks during training and is relevant to the current paper.

references.paper_title: Extended unconstrained features model for exploring deep neural collapse
references.reason: This paper extended the UFM to a more general setting, which is important for the current paper’s analysis of deep neural collapse in a non-linear model.
